tradition holds that Paul was beheaded by Nero around AD 62-65 and buried in a vineyard over which the Emperor Constantine built a basilica in 324 .在传说中，保罗于公元62到65年间被暴君尼禄斩首并被埋葬于一处葡萄园中，公元324年，康斯坦丁大帝在此修建了一座教堂。
